net.tridentsdk.api.event.block

Class NotePlayEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.api.event.Event
      • net.tridentsdk.api.event.block.BlockEvent
        • net.tridentsdk.api.event.block.NotePlayEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable

    public class NotePlayEvent
extends BlockEvent
implements Cancellable
    Called when a note is played, has a list of players that will hear this note
